abstract: Is Barry Boone making a confession, or is he merely excited about something else?
snippet: Is Barry Boone making a confession, or is he merely excited about something else?
lead_paragraph: WEDNESDAY'S PUZZLE - We last saw Barry Boone almost a year ago (Across Lite, Solution, blog) and, at first, I thought he was making a confession of sorts in today's puzzle. You'll see what I mean when you crack the theme, but it turns out that Mr. Boone is merely excited about the Major League Baseball playoffs.
